  • Method Details

    • name

      default String name()
      Description copied from interface: State
      The name of the model that this state belongs to, which is the enum class name. This is used for display purposes, and to make it clear which model a state belongs to when looking at the state of an individual person or the outbreak.
      Specified by:
      name in interface State<io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState.Builder,io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonHistory.Builder,PersonState,State.BehaviourState>
      Returns:
      the name of the model that this state belongs to, which is the enum class name.
